column4: Is it the lack of compositing that causes my windows to go black when I alt+tab?
anyone else using the ati drivers in Breezy?
actually, i am, on an M3
you find your windows go black when you press alt+tab?
I'm sorry, I didn't see a response, did you see my question?
when you alt+tab, does the selected window go black for you?
I don't know if its because of Xinerama, or what  :/
no, i get the list of windows
Right, but the window selected into the popup, is it black?
hrm, can I get your config?
thats OK, I might be able to work things out anyway :)
